body: > [!IMPORTANT] > Update dependencies and extend OpenAI model handling in `fetchLLMCompletion` to include O3 models. > > - **Dependencies**: > - Update `@langchain/anthropic` to `^0.3.12`, `@langchain/aws` to `^0.1.3`, `@langchain/core` to `^0.3.37`, `@langchain/google-vertexai` to `^0.1.8`, `@langchain/openai` to `^0.3.17`, and `langchain` to `^0.3.15` in `package.json`. > - **Functionality**: > - In `fetchLLMCompletion.ts`, extend workaround for OpenAI O1 models to O3 models by checking `modelParams.model` for "o3-" prefix. > - Set `temperature` to 1, use `max_completion_tokens`, and filter out system messages for O1 and O3 models. > > This description was created by [](https://www.ellipsis.dev?ref=langfuse%2Flangfuse&utm_source=github&utm_medium=referral) for c3034d8f49731fad44ccad5a7332ae32013bb871. It will automatically update as commits are pushed.
